scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Core_Title_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($page = $core_v2_urls.Current) #if ($page == 'Home') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Home')) #elseif ($page == 'LogIn') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Login_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'LogOut') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Logout_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'NotFound') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Error_NotFound_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Message') #set($title = $core_v2_message.Current.Name) #elseif ($page == 'User') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_UserProfile_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'Banned') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserBanned_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Conversation') #set($title = $core_v2_conversation.Current.FirstMessage.Subject) #elseif ($page == 'Conversations') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('ViewUserProfile_AllConversations')) #elseif ($page == 'AddUser') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('register')) #elseif ($page == 'ApiKeys') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('ApiKeys_AuthorizedApplications')) #elseif ($page == 'Tags') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_BrowseByTags_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Search') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_Search_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Achievements') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Achievements')) #elseif ($page == 'UserList') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserList_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'ChangePassword') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('EditProfile_PasswordChange')) #elseif ($page == 'ForgotPassword') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_ForgottenPassword_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Invite') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_InviteUsers_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Settings') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_Settings_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'AcceptInvitation') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_AcceptInvitation_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'AbuseAppeal') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Common_AbuseAppeal_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'AppealQueue') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Common_AppealQueue_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Activities') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_ActivityList_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'ActivityMessage') #set ($title = $core_v2_language.Truncate($core_v2_activityStory.Current.PreviewHtml('Web'), 100, '...')) #elseif ($page == 'Notifications') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Notifications_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Friends') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_FriendshipList_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'Favorites') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_FavorableContentList_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'UserLikes') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_Likes_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'UserAchievements') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_Achievements_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'UserMentions') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_Mentions_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($core_v2_groupUrls.Current == 'UserGroups') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_GroupList_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($page == 'UserThreads') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_Threads_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName)) #elseif ($core_v2_groupUrls.Current == 'Home') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Groups')) #elseif ($page == 'UserFiles') #if ($core_v2_userFolder.Current) #set($title = "$core_v2_userFolder.Current.Name - $core_v2_language.GetResource('files') - $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName") #else #set($title = "$core_v2_language.GetResource('files') - $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName") #end #elseif ($page == 'UserFile') #set($title = "$core_v2_userFile.Current.Name - $core_v2_language.GetResource('files') - $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName") #elseif ($page == 'UserFilesSlideshow') #set($title = "$core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_UserFileList_Title'), $core_v2_user.Current.DisplayName) - $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserProfile_Slideshow_Title')") #elseif ($page == 'UserConsent') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('ConsentRequired')) #elseif ($page == 'UserEmailVerification') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('UserEmailVerification')) #elseif ($core_v2_groupUrls.Current == 'AddGroup') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('Group_CreateGroup')) #elseif ($page == 'Custom' || $page == 'UserCustom') #set($title = $core_v2_widget.ApplyTokens($core_v2_customPage.Current.Title)) #end #if ($title) $core_v2_page.SetTitle($title, true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$title

#end #else $core_v2_page.SetTitle('', true, true) #end
